verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14619'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَارِعَةُ

وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13858'>دْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14619'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: Что объяснит тебе, Каков он - День Бича

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14620'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسُ كَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14621'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَرَاشِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14622'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14623'>بْ</tajweed>ث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ثِ
verses.translation: В тот День Рассеются, подобно мотылькам, все люди

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَكُونُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13919'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالُ كَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13920'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِهْنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14624'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14625'>نف</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>شِ
verses.translation: Подобно паутинкам легкой шерсти, Повиснут горы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14626'>ن ث</tajweed>َقُلَتْ مَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>زِينُهُۥ
verses.translation: И для того, чьи добрые деянья перевесят

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13890'>ةٍ ر</tajweed>َّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Жизнь уготована в прекрасном Рае, Где он найдет блаженство и покой

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>زِينُهُۥ
verses.translation: Но тот, кто легковесен был в земных деяньях

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Найдет убежище себе во Рву бездонном

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13858'>دْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: Как объяснить тебе, каков он, этот Ров
